numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that this graph gives insight into social values and experiences of people around the world.
2. This graph shows that older people see more ugly things in the world.
3. This graph shows that older people believe that this will not change over time.
4. There is a correlation between developed countries and the percentage of people who are at least 40 years old.
7. This conflict may be a reason.
8. People in developing countries may think that the world will not get better.
